## The Universal Data Language: Consistent Columns Across All Functions ğŸ—£ï¸

**ğŸ·ï¸ Your Variable Information Columns - The Standard Cast:**

- **`peptide`** ğŸ§¬: The peptide sequence (character) - your protein's building blocks
- **`peptide_site`** ğŸ“: Glycosylation site on the peptide (integer) - where the magic happens
- **`protein`** ğŸ·ï¸: UniProt accession (character) - your protein's official ID card
- **`protein_site`** ğŸ¯: Glycosylation site on the protein (integer) - the full-length coordinates
- **`gene`** ğŸ§¬: Gene symbol (character) - the genetic blueprint behind it all
- **`glycan_composition`** ğŸ§ª: A `glyrepr::glycan_composition()` object - what's in your glycan
- **`glycan_structure`** ğŸ—ï¸: A `glyrepr::glycan_structure()` object - how it's all connected
